channel.title: Steering Committee on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Steering Committee on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: OLSC Survey Provides Insights into Needs for Software Integration Standards
item.description: The OSLC steering committee is gathering feedback from the community to help shape the future vision and mission for OSLC.

item.title: New OASIS OSLC Steering Committee Announced
item.description: The September 2015 elections for the OASIS OSLC Steering Committee have concluded.
